website_summaries.verdict: For an organic gluten-free flour, this option is also allergy-friendly for milk, corn, and soy.
pros: A good choice for breading on fried foods
cons: This blend includes almond flour, which will not work for people who avoid tree nuts
This is not a one-to-one ratio product

customer_reviews.title: Best gluten-free flour I've used hands down
customer_reviews.text: Almost gone through the first bag of this wonderful gluten-free flour. Love the organic ingredients (and what's not in it). It has a very fine mill to it and works great for everything I've tried so far (pancakes and cookies). I've made several batches of pumpkin pancakes using a recipe I found on the Flour Farm website... absolutely the best pancakes I've made so far using gluten-free flours. I believe it's their flour formula that gives it superior flavor and results in baking and griddling. This flour is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: R. King

customer_reviews.title: Best GF Flour EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best. GF. Flour. Ever. I am over the moon about this flour! I was an avid baker before I found out I am severely allergic to gluten and because of crummy outcomes I haven’t baked very much. This flour has changed my mind! It’s beyond splendid in everything I’ve made from banana pancakes to pie crust. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: I love this flour!
customer_reviews.text: As I have gotten older, I find that I am more sensitive to gluten so have been looking for a gluten-free flour that bakes like All Purpose Flour! I found it in this product and am so thrilled! I baked zucchini bread from the Flour Farm website and my entire family devoured both loafs! Yay! This product tastes and bakes up perfectly! Thank you Flour Farm!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Brown

customer_reviews.title: I Make waffles with this flour
customer_reviews.text: I Make gluten free waffles with this flour. Gluten free waffles aren’t that great tasting to me so When I make my waffles I add one mashed up banana and chia seeds. The waffles come out softer but it tastes so much better, I eat it with fried eggs on top and some maple syrup 🤤
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: This was the best flour! So easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: This was the best flour! So easy to work with. Makes the best waffles and chocolate chip cookies my family's tasted...(and my daughter is a picky eater!) Will not buy any other flour...ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great organic combination of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a gluten free flour that offers organic almond and coconut flour mixture for awhile. I tried flour farms and loved it. I appreciate all the natural ingredients in this flour. I've baked with it and used some recipes off the flour.farm websight and they are delicious. I will definately continue to buy this flour And highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Chris Allen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than a loaf of bread. I did weigh it, it is 30oz...just believed the picture and did not fathom how small this is in volume. For $15 I expected a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Tsala

customer_reviews.title: I have honestly never tried a more perfect GF flour blend... Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Being gluten-free for several years, it’s very very difficult to find a GF blend that’s A) truly all-purpose and B) organic. Namaste is a popular organic blend BUT it contains thickeners... Oh man, and that Namaste tastes HORRIBLE. Dense and bland. You’re never lacking in the flavor department when cooking/baking with Flour Farm. Find a flour that makes you grateful to be GF. This one will do just that for you! Truly amazing! (Side note: I wish that the seal closed properly, it’s like a ziplock but it makes a mess and I have to use a chip-clip for this reason, but that certainly wouldn’t prevent me from buying this forever, ha!)
customer_reviews.author: Tbaker

customer_reviews.title: Delicious nutty flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love this flour. I don’t have to eat gluten free, but this flour makes you want to. My homemade pizza dough and artisan bread came out great. This added an additional nutty flavor which I enjoy. I would recommend that if you are using it just for the flavor and not for an allergy that you use 1 part this flour and 2 parts regular all-purpose flour.
customer_reviews.author: The Idahoan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty blend of flours
customer_reviews.text: Great taste! I only wish it came in bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product y’all
customer_reviews.text: I’m a guy who doesn't really bake but this made the best darn pancakes. 😋 I’ll be trying some of the recipes they have available in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Groovefactory

customer_reviews.title: Good gf flour!
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, but works great as a gf flour substitute!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G Olson

customer_reviews.title: too gritty
customer_reviews.text: Although it did not have an aftertaste (like coconut flour), it is terribly gritty. I made butter cookies and it felt like sandpaper. It did not have the smooth consistency of flour. I think if they ground ALOT more this would be a good baking blend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for those that can’t have gluten. I also love that it’s organic.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great flour!
customer_reviews.text: Great flour! I use it for all recipes because my daughter can not tolerate gluten and I have never had a recipe where I could tell the difference from regular wheat flour! Great for baking and for use in savory dishes! I love that it’s organic and gluten free, a difficult combination to find!
customer_reviews.author: Rad health

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flour, wish was more of a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaism

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Used the flour to make some super good cookies. So happy to find a healthy alternative to wheat flour. So easy to adjust the measurements for my recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING...I use all the time since I can't tolerate Gluten...NO ADDITIVES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: UNLIKE ALL OTHER GLUTEN FREE FLOURS...NO ADDITIVES ADDED. MY HOMEMADE ORGANIC BANANA CINNAMON BREAD COMES OUT AMAZING EVERY TIME!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good combination.
customer_reviews.text: I like this blend with sweet white rice flour and nut flours especially.
customer_reviews.author: Iola Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend!
customer_reviews.text: My friend foods are much more moist with this flour blend. I've used in on chicken, seafood and as a thickener. Excited about using it as a baking substitute!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barfield

customer_reviews.title: One of the best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flour! Gluten free, organic, and great taste!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute
customer_reviews.text: Love this flour for baking. Being gluten free I miss yummy treats. I can make anything with this flour.
customer_reviews.author: StephD

customer_reviews.title: I dollow the package instruction and my pancakes don cook wellk
customer_reviews.text: my pancakes are raw with this flour, and iand I follow the package instructions
customer_reviews.author: paloma bernal

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy flour blend. So far I have used it for muffins, brownies, cookies and pancakes and I have no complaints 🥳
customer_reviews.author: Dixie L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it is organic❣️
customer_reviews.text: The biscuits are the best! But being a diabetic it was a little bit too much butter I actually bought the Flour for waffles can’t wait to make them.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Monteleone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good flour just very expensive but very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Sitton

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for wheat/pastry flour!
customer_reviews.text: I like to diversify my flours so I don't get too much gluten in my diet. This one works great as a replacement for regular wheat flour. It creates a very similar texture and rises about the same. It doesn't give your baked goods a funny flavor at all. I enjoy writing quality reviews. If you found this review helpful please click yes below. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Leading Image US

customer_reviews.title: Works great with no modifications
customer_reviews.text: I tested my old fashioned yellow cake recipe with no modifications. The cupcakes came out moist and delicious. I was a bit concerned because the batter tasted unpleasant, but after cooking the weird taste was gone. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: If You GF Bake, You Need Flour Farm Flour
customer_reviews.text: Their blend of coconut, almond, rice and tapioca flours are perfect for baking. My lemon pound cake, cheddar biscuits and my favorite, chocolate chip cookies, turn out delicious and perfect. The flour is USDA organic, non GMO and when you purchase from their website, they make a donation to 2nd Harvest Food Bank. This year, for all my holiday baking I'll be using Flour Farm.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi R

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and tasty
customer_reviews.text: We love this gluten-free flour! We’ve replaced our regular flour with it and have been surprised with the results. I was very skeptical that anything could actually replace regular flour, but we’ve made bread, cookies, muffins, and even ramen with it and they all have been delicious. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Henson

customer_reviews.title: Good GF Flour
customer_reviews.text: I received a bag of this flour to try out in October. I used it to make my husband's favorite banana muffin recipe and it turned out great. I also used it to make a pumpkin cake and it turned out great too. I only tried one recipe off their website, but it was good. I would like to try it again with more of our favorite recipes. I liked the results of everything I tried and was happy that it was organic.
customer_reviews.author: Ax2Mommy

product_meta.title: Organic Gluten Free Flour Blend - All Purpose Flour made with 5 Organic GF Ingredients - Sweet Rice Flour, Brown Rice Flour, Tapioca Flour, Almond Flour & Coconut Flour - by Flour Farm
feature_bullets: ENJOY ALL YOUR FAVORITE FOODS - GLUTEN FREE! - Whether you want to make cookies, pancakes, pizza dough, bread, pastry or snacks, you will make better batter with Flour Farm! If it's in your cookbooks and calls for flour, you can substitute our plant based organic flour blend & make healthier, better tasting food

A HEALTHY CHOICE - CERTIFIED GLUTEN-FREE, CERTIFIED ORGANIC - Non-GMO VERIFIED by GFCO - Certified USDA Organic, Kosher & Halal Certified by Union Pareve & INFANCA. Naturally vegan. Our blend tastes naturally sweet and lightly nutty
STAY TRUE TO YOUR GF DIET - Our unique mix is a great alternative for for those who need or want a gluten free diet (due to celiac disease, allergies or a personal choice) without compromising taste

TASTES GREAT! - Flour Farm Gluten Free flour is corn-free, soy-free, wheat-free, dairy- free, BPA-free. Zero added Sugar. Non-GMO, No Preservatives or artificial anything! Does not include Xanthum Gum. SUBSTITUTE 120g (1 cup + 1.5 Tablespoons) per cup of flour requested from your recipe

BLENDED IN THE USA - We source our products from the finest farms in the world, but they all proudly come together right here in the USA. Cup for cup you will not find a better tasting gluten free flour out there. Try it with our 30-day 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
